Title
Residential House on Marat Street
Description
The residential building at 13 Marata Street was a part of an ensemble of four buildings, with three of the four built in the 1950s. Despite its overall modesty, the facade was adorned with a number of neoclassical decorations. After a missile strike, several sections of the building were destroyed. Residents want the building to be restored, but city authorities doubt this is possible.
Date of Construction
1950-s
Date of Destruction
2023-02-01
Subsection
residential
Location
Краматорськ / Kramatorsk
Region
Donetsk oblast
Source
